content.en: Bioinformatics algorithms: Scientists are using algorithms to address various research questions in the field of biology. These algorithms are being attributed agency in tasks such as modifying simulation algorithms, modeling gene regulatory networks, simulating biological processes, inferring gene network models, and quantifying heterogeneity in gene expression. The development of these algorithms is enabling scientists to better understand and analyze complex biological systems.
content.da: Bioinformatik-algoritmer: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at besvare forskellige forskningsspørgsmål inden for biologien. Disse algoritmer tilskrives agentur i opgaver som at modificere simulationsalgoritmer, modellere genreguleringsnetværk, simulere biologiske processer, udlede gennetværksmodeller og kvantificere heterogenitet i genekspression. Udviklingen af disse algoritmer gør det muligt for forskere at forstå og analysere komplekse biologiske systemer bedre.
